item.title: Trump megabill: Who will benefit in midterms -- Republicans or Democrats?
item.description: Republicans see a lot to celebrate, but Democrats are hoping to build momentum leading into the 2026 midterms.

item.title: Deadly storm slams New Jersey, hard-hit town cancels 4th of July celebration
item.description: A deadly storm with winds topping 60 mph tore through central New Jersey on Thursday night, forcing one town to cancel its Fourth of July celebrations...

item.title: WATCH: Powerful storms slam Northeast overnight
item.description: A huge line of severe weather passed through on Thursday night, killing at least three people in New Jersey and complicating travel for millions on th...

item.title: WATCH: Remembering the Real ‘Uncle Sam’ on Independence Day
item.description: Uncle Sam, long a symbol of the U.S. government, was inspired by a real person — Sam Wilson, a meatpacker from Troy, New York, born in 1766.

item.title: A strike by air traffic controllers is disrupting travel to, from and over France
item.description: A strike by French air traffic controllers is disrupting travel
